data.title: Cooperation
meta_keywords: Київський столичний університет імені Бориса Грінченка
data.meta_description: Collaboration with: - Institute of Mathematics of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine, - V.M. Glushkov Institute of Cybernetics NAS of Ukraine, - V...
data.text:
Collaboration with:

- Institute of Mathematics of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine,

- V.M. Glushkov Institute of Cybernetics NAS of Ukraine,

- V.E. Lashkaryov Institute of Semiconductor Physics NAS of Ukraine,

- G.E. Pukhov Institute for Modelling in Energy Engineering NAS of Ukraine,

- Institute of Mathematical Machines and Systems NAS of Ukraine,

- Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv (Ukraine),

- Institute of information technologies and teaching tools of the National Academy of Educational Sciences of Ukraine,

- Kharkiv National University of Radio Electronics (Ukraine),

- National Technical University of Ukraine “Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute” (Ukraine),

- Tallinn University of Technology (Estonia),

- The University of Silesia in Katowice (Poland),

- University of Agder (Norway).

The faculty has established and is developing close ties with international funds and institutions: Erasmus+, Eurasia, International Renaissance Foundation, International Visegrad Fund, etc. Such cooperation involves both joint scientific research and academic mobility of teachers and students.

The teachers of the faculty took part in international projects:

- Modernization of pedagogical higher education by innovative teaching instruments (MOPED), 2017-2020

- Partnership for learning and teaching in university mathematics (PLATINUM), 2018-2021,

- Development of students’ mathematical competencies through digital mathematical modeling (DeDiMaMo), 2019-2022,

- Digital Transformation in Education: best EU studies (DigTriES), 2022
